communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The page or pages for the entries regarding:

1.) Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19)
2.) Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)
3.) COVID
4.) The US response for COVID/COVID-19/SARS-CoV-2
5.) National Security Presidential Directive NSPD 51/Homeland Security Presidential Directive HSPD-20

(including whatever similar topic may pertain if it is slightly worded differently) from the three Wikis that make up the Intellipedia.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tod Elario

title: Virginia Military Institute Social Media Tracking

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all contracts (as well as all associated amendments, exhibits, and materials), memorandums of understanding, and other equivalent agreements entered into by this agency with Geofeedia LLC or any other social media surveillance software or equipment company (including but not limited to Brightplaent, Geofeedia, Intrado Inc, LifeRaft, Magnet Forensics, Media Sonar, Signal Corporation, Maxient and/or ZeroFOX). As of 2016 VMI was using Geofeedia and according to previous FOIA requests on your site Maxient in recent years, but this request is for what is current being used. Responsive materials should include but not be limited to:

• the initial Invitation to Bid, Request for Proposal, or equivalent call for contractors
• the responsive materials provided by the winning bidder
• other bidder responses
• the current contract
• all exhibits
• all amendments
• all performance work statements
• all deliverables inventories
• all invoices related to the deliverance of software, services, or goods

Please also include:
• all policies related to the acquisition and use of social media use and surveillance by individual officers and representatives of this agency
• name, position of all those authorized to use these software platforms and what each person uses them for.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tom Nash, a citizen of Virginia, in coordination with Anonymous.

title: FOIA-DNI – Intelligence Reports on the Emergence of COVID-19

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: FOIA-DNI – Intelligence Reports on the Emergence of COVID-19
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I respectfully request access to any intelligence briefings, situation reports, assessments, or similar documents that the Office of the Director of National Intelligence (ODNI), its Directorates, or Mission Centers provided to (including but not limited to information sent through JWICS, SIPRNET, and/or other secure networks):

The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
The Department of Health and Human Services (HHS)
The Senate Select Committee on Intelligence (SSCI)

Specifically, I am seeking records related to the emergence and initial reports of COVID-19, also referred to as:

Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19)
Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)
Please include all such materials from the period of November 2019 to March 2020.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tod Elario
